modName: Eli The Younger - Standalone Mage Follower
summary: Standalone cute and adorable frost mage follower!
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=https://flic.kr/p/QdwoMn][/url]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/QdwoG2][img]https://c2.staticflickr.com/6/5603/31646852505_8bd9d3c48a_c.jpg[/img][/url]


[size=4]Eli The Younger[/size]
[size=4]Standalone Follower[/size]
Preset included


[u]Little background story
[youtube]1VGOYXMCsas[/youtube][/u]


[url=https://flic.kr/p/QdwoK8][img]https://c6.staticflickr.com/1/613/31646852685_fbccd08e98_c.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Q52iUi][img]https://c6.staticflickr.com/1/350/31550646181_a0410bda86_c.jpg[/img][/url][/center][font=Verdana][center]


[size=2]You can find her in her room at Blue Palace
She uses Female Young Eager voice
Body UNP Top Model
She has her own outfit based on Mini Collection with Rustic textures.
Body textures supports HDT Vagina
[/size]

Hot files 20-12-16!
[url=https://flic.kr/p/P7Qpuw][img]https://c3.staticflickr.com/1/468/30926111474_84d95ff238_z.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=3]Recomended mods:[/size][/center]
